actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the rates of disability compensation for disabled veterans, and the rates of dependency and indemnity compensation for their survivors, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the rates of disability compensation for disabled veterans, and the rates of dependency and indemnity compensation for their survivors.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the rates of disability compensation for disabled veterans, and the rates of dependency and indemnity compensation for their survivors, and for other purposes.
